developer: MEASAT BROADCAST NETWORK SYSTEMS SDN. BHD.
description:
SOOKA – Stream the Best of LIVE Sports and Entertainment

Experience the thrill of LIVE sports and the best of entertainment shows, all in one place!

With sooka, you can stream your favorite live matches, catch exclusive dramas, and enjoy top-tier entertainment wherever you go – all from as low as RM12.50 onwards!

 

Why Choose Sooka?

LIVE Sports – The best of Local & International Football, Badminton, Formula 1, and many more, streamed in high quality!

Entertainment for Everyone –  Local & International Dramas, Variety Shows, Comedies, Movies, and much more.

LIVE Singing Shows – Catch electrifying performances and competitions as they happen!

Kids Shows – The best fun and educational shows, perfect for the little ones.

80+ LIVE Channels – Enjoy non-stop entertainment, from sports to news and more!

Perfect for the Whole Family – Something for everyone, from sports fans to drama lovers!

Stream Anytime, Anywhere – On-demand access to your favorite content.

Flexible, Affordable Plans, No Contracts – Enjoy premium entertainment from just RM12.50 onwards!

 

New and Improved Experience

Easier Navigation: A fresh look and feel with an upgraded user interface for easier navigation and better content discovery.

Discover More: sooka now has a new app layout and better features that help you discover more of the content you love, including a feature to pin your favourite channels and shows.

Improved Performance: Now with smoother playback experience and faster load times and a more stable streaming experience.

 

New Features

Voice Search

Live Pause

Reminder to watch

Programming schedule details up to 7 days

Zoom & Best fit Screen

Don’t miss out on the action! Download sooka now and start streaming today.

Follow us for more live sports and content updates:

Website: https://sooka.my

Help: sooka 

Whatsapp: +60395493792

Facebook: sooka Malaysia | Kuala Lumpur

Instagram: sooka (@sookamalaysia) on IG

X: sooka (@sookamalaysia) on X

Tiktok: sooka malaysia on TikTok


*Terms and conditions apply.

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Looking for a pickleball club near you? Maybe a swing coach to improve your game? Maybe you’re new to the city and want to join a volleyball league. Reclub is the app that’s powering the global sports community.

Use Reclub to:

DISCOVER. Find sports near you. Pick your city + sport to find other players who love the game as much as you do.
MEET. Make an activity. Play a round robin. Invite your friends to come to the court and join the fun.
RUN A CLUB. Club management made easy. Round robins, leagues and social drop-ins, all done in a few taps.
COMPETE. Setup pickleball tournaments. football competitions, or any other sport in a snap. Brackets, leagues and registration all in one place.
CHAT. Connect with the other athletes. Setup a drop-in with club members.

Terms of service: https://reclub.co/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://reclub.co/privacy

JomRun is Southeast Asia’s leading running app. Users can browse through more than 1000 running events in Southeast Asia and register with 0 admin fees!

You can also track your own running session and earn points to redeem vouchers and free gifts!

JomRun combines tech with running, providing you with the most convenient way to search and join a running event!

Users can pay using:
Malaysia- Grabpay, Boost e-wallet, online banking, VISA/ Mastercard, Sarawakpay
Indonesia-Gopay, ATM banking

The App integrate with HealthKit enable you to track your steps data and and earn points that you can redeem for attractive offers in Malaysia.

AFA is Malaysia’s leading sports community superapp that connects people through sports with an incredibly easy and rewarding experience. 

1. Easily create activities, invite friends, manage RSVPs, team grouping, and split payments for venue fees. Say goodbye to RSVP stress!

2. Book venues instantly, with over 90 partners nationwide, pay securely with AFA Pay, and get reminders for upcoming events.

3. Find and join existing groups for all kinds of sports near you, with only a few taps.

4. Use AFA Pay, a secure e-wallet within the app, to make smooth and easy payments. Keep track of your spending history and wallet transactions.

5. Earn reward points for being active, get discounts on venue bookings, redeem rewards from partners, and access special perks. Stay active and have fun!

And more to come!

We are constantly working behind-the-scenes to improve the experience for all types of users: Curious app users, casual sport players, active game organisers and you! Stick with us. :) 

AFA is the sports community superapp you’ve always wanted!

developer: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

Play Fantasy Premier League:
The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Explore every Premier League match ever played:
Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

Unofficial Companion App
This app is not a game. It is a powerful companion tool designed for football game enthusiasts who want to get more from their experience. Packed with databases, calculators, tutorials, and build tools everything you need to plan your dream team.

PLAYER DATABASE
Explore a detailed player database with smart tools to help you find top talent and understand their strengths.

View player stats at max level.

See dribbling skills with controller animations.

Understand how condition affects stats and ratings.

Instantly spot top 6 key stats on every player card.

Track player form throughout the season.

MANAGER DATABASE
Stay ahead with up-to-date manager formations and tactics.

Find managers who have changed tactics weekly.

Search based on offensive and defensive playstyles.

Use the formation search tool to find your perfect setup.

SQUAD BUILDER
Build squads like a pro, with full control over strength and cost.

Automatically calculate team strength for 2, 3, or 4-star builds.

Position players under different managers.

Save unlimited squads and experiment freely.

Use Auto Build for quick team generation.

Track contract cost totals for better squad planning.

GAME PLAN
Simulate off-the-ball movement in attack and defense to spot tactical strengths and weaknesses in your squad.

HIDDEN GEM FINDER
Discover underrated players with high potential and low contract renewal cost — perfect for long-term builds.

MY TEAM
Save your favorite players and managers to access quickly when building squads or browsing stats.

SKILL MOVE TUTORIALS
Learn how to perform dribbling skills step-by-step with controller animations — for both mobile and console players.

Disclaimer
This is an app designed for learning and planning purposes. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any football game developer or publisher.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings
•	Driver and conductor standings 

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:
•	Live telemetry data and session insights, including comprehensive tyre Information, lap times, speed and DRS.
•	Real-time interactive Driver Tracker Maps
•	Live English audio commentary
•	Listen to the drama unfold with the best of Team Radio

Download now for your ultimate companion into the world of Formula 1.

How to subscribe to F1® TV

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/terms-of-use
Subscription terms and conditions: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/subscription-terms
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

CheckPointSpot - Your Race Starts Here

Stay ahead of your sports with CheckPointSpot, the all-in-one app designed for every sports enthusiasts. Whether you're a seasoned athlete, a casual enthusiast, or just starting your fitness journey, CheckPointSpot is designed to provide you with a seamless and enhanced experience in joining sports events.

Key Features:

Events Calendar: Find the sports that suit you from our vast list of events throughout the year.

Multi Sports: Whether you like to walk, run, cycle, swim or workout at your own comfort with virtual sports events, we definite have one for you.

My Events: No more losing track of the events you joined. All your registered upcoming events are conveniently stored in your app. With one click QR, you can easily retrieve your event QR during race pack collection.

Private Convenience: Login to retrieve your events receipts, e-certificate, race results, photos and video with just a click.

Social Integration: Share your favorite sports events with your friends and family. It is always fun to race with those close and personal to you.



Stay healthy and fit with CheckPointSpot!

Download CheckPointSpot now and bring your sports experience to the next level.

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Privacy policy: https://fishingpoints.app/privacy
Terms of Use: https://fishingpoints.app/terms

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Are you struggling to find players for your tennis/pickleball tournament? Is event promotion not effective? Or have you missed an important match because you couldn't find the livestream? Baseline is the app made just for you!

Baseline is the perfect solution for:

Download Baseline, the pioneering app digitalizing tennis/pickleball in Vietnam today and elevate your experience! Baseline will be your essential companion on your journey to pursuing your passion!

About this app

We go cashless with GoNetPay! Pay for bills, booking, ordering goods and service from your app!

In view of digitalization of the business market and the change of consumer behaviour and lifestyle, GoNet ecosystem is a super app tied up with GoNetPay e-wallet to offer an all-in-one platform for customer to pay for bills, book sports facilities venue, book event or function venue as well as order goods and service.

WHY USE GONET

USER ADVANTAGE: GoNet provide service platform at your convenience to bring close between you and vendors through your smartphone to save time. Payment for bills, booking, ordering goods and service can be completed via GoNetPay e-wallet across the app. Also, you can show your own unique QR code to merchant for payment or scan selected merchants’ QR code to perform payment.

HASSLE-FREE PAYMENT: Short of cash in hand? Can't find the nearest ATM machine? No problem. As an alternative, just pay with GoNetPay e-wallet through your smartphone. Besides that, you can also Transfer Money or Request Money from your friend and family across contact number in your smartphone.

MARKETING & PROMOTION: New customers who just registered an account on GoNet App get to enjoy Promo Code of extra RM10 credit top up after their first minimum RM30 e-wallet upon reload is successful. Promo Code will also be issued for special events from time to time.

TRUSTED: As an e-money, the system is built with the best technology to keep your personal and financial information secure and encrypted. To be more specific, only you can authorise every payment transaction by performing your 6-digit personal transaction PIN.

CORPORATE SOCIAL RESPONSIBILITY PROGRAM: For every transaction that you perform, we contribute 1% of the transaction fee to the Foundation Fund account to serve the unfortunate individuals and NGO.

What’s new!

Make use of Promo Code! Keep up to date with the latest deals & offers in your GoNet Mail today.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

Sports We Play App is a simple fitness app that helps you to pursue each station and simultaneously record your new score. Sports We Play App also provides accurate instruction that leads you pursue each station. Sports We Play Application is free to use but must work with BAST(Brilliant Apposite Systemic Training).

*Home Page
In the Home Page, you may view the story and the post for more latest information.

*ATTENDANCE Page
You able to view your attendance for each month. You are also able to view total present day and total absent day in a month.

*Profile Page
You able to view your name, id, age, weight, and height in the Profile Page.

GridBox is your ultimate F1 companion, designed to keep you on top of every race with a stylish countdown widget. Personalize your home and lock screens with beautifully designed widgets that not only keep you informed but also enhance your phone’s aesthetic. Stay ahead of the race and add a touch of elegance to your device with GridBox!

Love playing padel but hate spending hours looking for a venue across 10 different websites, apps, and neighborhoods?

Join Courtside, the super sports app that connects padel players to coaches, events, and venues all over Indonesia in one user-friendly app.

Whether you already have friends to play with or are open to meeting new people on the court, Courtside gives you the opportunity to connect with like-minded players and existing friends in exciting venues anywhere in the +62 region. Courtside gives you the ability to create private matches and track who’s coming -  oh, and keep track of their scores as well! 

Playing Padel has never been easier! Search by location , and all that’s left to do is book, pay, and play – in as little as 3 minutes. Cover your court fees and pay via local payment partners. The slot you want is taken? No problem, just let the app notify you when it’s next available. You can also share your next booking through WhatsApp making it easier to remember.

If you’re on the hunt for exciting padel events, Courtside has you covered. Join events all over the country, showcase your mad skills, and have fun with new players all while exploring different clubs and venues. Communities grow, you get better as a player - win-win!

Come see what we have to offer - join us courtside.

Easy Tournament is a website and app to organize championships, leagues and tournaments. Post the results, leaderboard, photos, videos and news so that everyone can follow your championship.

With the app you also have rankings of players, you can create polls and votes, attach documents, print scoresheets and tables, share images of the results, open for registrations and many other features.

SPORT AND MODALITIES
Manage tournaments of different sports and eSports

SOCCER
FUTSAL
HANDBALL
BASKETBALL
VOLLEYBALL
TENNIS
TABLE TENNIS (PING PONG)
MOBA (LOL, DOTA)
BATTLE ROYALE (FORTNITE, FREE FIRE, CALL OF DUTY)
SHOOT GAMES
ONLINE FOOTBALL (PES, FIFA)
And several other options for you to create the tournament you want.

TYPES OF CHAMPIONSHIPS
You can easily create round-robin tournaments , knockouts, groups, or a combination of whatever you want. It is also possible to create championships with several categories, great for school games or championships with age divisions or separated by male / female.

COMPLETE SYSTEM
With the app you can add moderators to help you edit the championship, send team registration links, add sponsor banners, team logos and player photos, share on social networks and much more.

If you have any questions please contact us the way you prefer and we will help you as soon as possible.

Download now and start using the best tournament manager.

Watch out! You are blocked by the other cars, it's time to leave. Guide your car to leave the parking lot safely. Be careful, keep off the other cars!

There are many obstacles in the narrow parking lot. You need to avoid all the obstacles and leave the parking lot in the correct order. Can you get through these difficulties?

Features: 
Classic level gameplay: solve various puzzles one by one, get various rewards after clearing.
Challenge mode: including simple challenges and difficult challenges. The higher the difficulty, the more rewards.
Sign-in system: obtain coin rewards everyday.
Multiple skinning: various types of cars, different scenes, even car exhaust and NPC obstacles have different designs.

What are you waiting for? Challenge your brain with this tricky game now!
